purpose: Frequently asked questions and responses organized by industry and category

dental.question: We already use OpenDental/Dentrix. Can this integrate?
dental.answer: Yes, fully compatible with all major PMS platforms including OpenDental, Dentrix, Eaglesoft, and others. We also integrate via Make.com/N8N for custom workflows.

dental.question: Is this just another chatbot?
dental.answer: No. Our Voice AI Agents sound completely natural, handle complex objections, and follow intelligent conversational flows - not rigid IVR menus. Patients often don't realize they're speaking with AI.

dental.question: Is this HIPAA compliant for patient information?
dental.answer: Yes, all systems are HIPAA compliant with enterprise-grade encryption, secure data handling, and proper BAA agreements. Patient data never leaves secure, compliant servers.

hvac.question: Can it handle true emergency calls at 2 AM?
hvac.answer: Absolutely. Our Emergency Management Agent operates 24/7, instantly routes urgent calls to on-call technicians, and follows your exact emergency protocols.

hvac.question: We use ServiceTitan/HouseCallPro. Will it sync?
hvac.answer: Yes, we integrate with all major HVAC software including ServiceTitan, HouseCallPro, FieldEdge, and others. Appointments, customer data, and job details sync automatically.

hvac.question: Can it handle seasonal call volume spikes?
hvac.answer: Yes, our system automatically scales during peak seasons. No busy signals, no missed emergency calls, and no need to hire seasonal staff.

general.question: How long does setup take?
general.answer: Most implementations are completed within 2-4 weeks. We handle all the technical setup while you focus on running your business.

general.question: What's the pricing structure?
general.answer: We offer transparent monthly plans starting at $199/month per Voice Agent. No hidden fees, no per-call charges. ROI typically covers costs within 30-60 days.
